content.stem:
The height of adult women in the United States can be approximated by a normal distribution with a mean of 65 inches and a standard deviation of 3 inches.

 

Click on the number line to show a vertical line that approximates the height at which 25% of the women are shorter and 75% are taller.

rubric.name: Rubric
rubric.val:
Exemplar:

 

  • The student should draw a vertical line at a height of 63 inches.

 

For this item, a full-credit response includes

 

  • a single vertical line that intersects the x-axis at 63 inches. (1 point)

content.stem:
La estatura de las mujeres adultas en Estados Unidos se puede aproximar mediante una distribución normal con una media de 65 pulgadas y una desviación estándar de 3 pulgadas.

 

Haz clic en la recta numérica para mostrar una línea vertical que se aproxime a una estatura tal que 25% de las mujeres son más bajas y el 75% son más altas que esa estatura.

 

The height of adult women in the United States can be approximated by a normal distribution with a mean of 65 inches and a standard deviation of 3 inches.

 

Click on the number line to show a vertical line that approximates the height at which 25% of the women are shorter and 75% are taller.

rubric.name: Rubric _Spanish
rubric.val:
Exemplar:

 

  • The student should draw a vertical line at a height of 63 inches.

 

For this item, a full-credit response includes

 

  • a single vertical line that intersects the x-axis at 63 inches. (1 point)
